definition: joys and sorrows/partings and reunions/the vicissitudes of life
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Used to seeing the kind of joys and sorrows, may suddenly feel this is the life.
sentences.chinese: 看慣了那種悲歡離合，突然覺得可能這纔是生活。

sentences.english: Human's love has division of the vicissitudes of life.
sentences.chinese: 人的愛情有悲歡離合之分。

sentences.english: She saw how many vicissitudes, she has the number of prosperous dream.
sentences.chinese: 她看過多少悲歡離合，她歷經多少繁華如夢。

sentences.english: Or it can be said that there is corresponding relations in various vicissitudes of life.
sentences.chinese: 或者說是各種各樣的悲歡離合內在裏是有對應關係的。

sentences.english: Whispering flowers were King, nor are songs.
sentences.chinese: 花開花落皆爲景，悲歡離合都是歌。

sentences.english: Growth is a song, sing all separation and joy in union.
sentences.chinese: 成長是一首歌，唱盡悲歡離合。

sentences.english: Joys and sorrows of human always presents repeatedly.
sentences.chinese: 人的悲歡離合，一幕幕重複的上演。

sentences.english: Dream and reality gap, joys and sorrows, and might be sensitized mixed feelings.
sentences.chinese: 夢想與現實的差距，喜怒哀樂，悲歡離合，百感交集。

sentences.english: I Beihuanchige is your earth-shaking sadness.
sentences.chinese: 你們的悲歡離合是我兵荒馬亂的悲傷。

sentences.english: So there are many stories of vicissitudes of life in the world every day.
sentences.chinese: 所以這個世界天天上演着悲歡離合的故事。

definition: separated in life and death/to part for ever
the ways of the world/social behavior
different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
four types of human emotions, namely: happiness 歡喜|欢喜[huan1 xi3], anger 憤怒|愤怒[fen4 nu4], sorrow 悲哀[bei1 ai1] and joy 快樂|快乐[kuai4 le4]
ordinary and mediocre (idiom); nothing to write home about
prosperity and decline (of a kingdom)/rise and fall
(of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
